REVIEW.TITLE: Review
REVIEW.DESC: Choose an article in the list to the right. Article that gets approved disappear from the list.

GLOBAL.SUBJECT: Topic
GLOBAL.TARGET_TOPIC_SPEC: {{target}} uses words like {{topic}} and similar phrases which interests them. Add words and phrases that fits below.
GLOBAL.KEYWORD_SPEC: {{target}} uses the following words and phrases to find adticles while in the step {{step}}:
GLOBAL.NAME: Name
GLOBAL.HEADLINE: Headline
GLOBAL.TITLE: Title
GLOBAL.AUTHOR: Author

LOGIN.WRONGUSERNAMEPASSWORD: You entered an invalid username or password.
LOGIN.PASSWORDSENT: A login reset link has been sent to your email address.
LOGIN.PASSWORDERROR: Something went wrong. Are you sure you entered the right email address?
LOGIN.BACK: Go back to the login page

TARGET.TITLE: Target groups
TARGET.CONFIRMREMOVE: Are you sure you want to remove this target group?

ORDER.TITLE: Order
ORDER.DESCRIPTION: Order part of articles, like text, images and media och assign them on different people. Use the article picker to add articles that you want to work with..
ORDER.SHOWLISTINGS: Use this article part in listings
ORDER.PUBLISHINFO: (or when all article parts are approved, whatever happens first.)

PLAN.TITLE: Plan
PLAN.DESCRIPTION: Create new articles and plan in the list to the left, or choose existing articles in the article picker. Click on any of the articles to plan the article in detail.

STEP.TITLE: Steps
STEP.DESCRIPTION: Specify the steps that you expect your readers to go as they grow familiar with you.
STEP.CONFIRMREMOVE: Are you sure you want to remove this step?

MANAGE.TITLE: Manage
MANAGE.DESCRIPTION: Choose the article to manage in the list to the left. Use the article picker to add more articles.
MANAGE.PUBLISHINFO: The article was sen to {{channel}} for publishing {{date}}
MANAGE.CONFIRMPARTREMOVE: Are you sure you want to remove this article part?
MANAGE.CONFIRMARTICLEREMOVE: Are you sure you want to remove this article?

DELIVER.TITLE: Deliver
DELIVER.DESCRIPTION: All article parts that you are responsible for are in the list to the left. Pick an article to start delivering.

ARTICLEPICKER.TITLE: Add articles
ARTICLEPICKER.DESCRIPTION: Choose which articles that should be added in the article list:
ARTICLEPICKER.EMPTYBEFORE: Empty the article list before adding articles

CLIPBOARD.DESCRIPTION: Use the article picker to select articles..

USER.CONFIRMUSERNAMECHANGEMESSAGE: Click on the button above to confirm the change of the user name
USER.INVALIDUSERNAME: You must have at least 4 characters in your user name. They can only be of the characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and . - _ ~
USER.LANGUAGEHELP: Choose a language for the administrative interface. Your choice has nothing to do with the language you are writing articles on.
USER.EMAILHELP: Enter your email address and click the button Verify
USER.EMAILVERIFYHELP: An email has been sent to {{email}} with a verification code. Efter the code here and press the button Update
USER.EMAILVERIFICATIONFAIL: The email address could not be changed
USER.TITLE: Users
USER.PASSWORDDESC: Enter a new password here to change the password of the user. The password will not be changed if a new password is not provided.

ARTICLE.LOCKEDTEXT: The article part is being edited by {{user}}.

ENDPOINT.CONFIRMREMOVE: Are you sure you want to remove the endpoint?
ENDPOINT.TITLE: Endpoints
ENDPOINT.NOTAUTHORIZED: This connection has not been authorized yet.
